analysis.description:
PrototypeNetworkToken.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7d638a267074f87d820bc285e8295e8de1d9a89.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7d638a267074f87d820bc285e8295e8de1d9a89.sol)

Lock.availablePercent (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7d638a267074f87d820bc285e8295e8de1d9a89.sol#176-185) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- percent > 100 (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7d638a267074f87d820bc285e8295e8de1d9a89.sol#183-184)

Lock.issueToken (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7d638a267074f87d820bc285e8295e8de1d9a89.sol#185-192) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(lockStartTime[_to] == 0) (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7d638a267074f87d820bc285e8295e8de1d9a89.sol#189)

PrototypeNetworkToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7d638a267074f87d820bc285e8295e8de1d9a89.sol#267-277) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lockStartTime[msg.sender] > 0 (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7d638a267074f87d820bc285e8295e8de1d9a89.sol#273-277)

PrototypeNetworkToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7d638a267074f87d820bc285e8295e8de1d9a89.sol#277-291) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lockStartTime[_from] > 0 (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7d638a267074f87d820bc285e8295e8de1d9a89.sol#285-291)
